rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0001
rows.name: What a breathtaking view this is.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0002
rows.name:
I can't help but wonder
how they constructed such
an impressive structure.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0003
rows.name: Ngh...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0004
rows.name:
This place is really hard
on Blades, isn't it?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0005
rows.name:
I get what you mean. This place
is really rough on us Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0006
rows.name:
Indeed, this is a harsh
place for Blades.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0007
rows.name:
This is a tough place for
Blades, ain't it? I
understand that well too...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0008
rows.name:
Not at all! I can
handle this just fine.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0009
rows.name: Well, but... Are you okay, Tokiha?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0010
rows.name:
Tokiha, you shouldn't
push yourself too hard.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0011
rows.name:
But... You're clearly straining
yourself, aren't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0012
rows.name:
But you're just being stubborn,
right? You're not looking too good.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0013
rows.name: I said... I'm fine!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0014
rows.name: Anyway, why did you want to come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0015
rows.name:
Still though, what made it
necessary to visit this place?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0016
rows.name:
Nevertheless, what was your reason
for needing to visit here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0017
rows.name: So what brought ya here anyway?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0018
rows.name: Well... What do you think my reason is?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0019
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0020
rows.name: You wanted to meet the hero Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0021
rows.name: Because you like painful things?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0022
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0023
rows.name:
Because you wanted to
meet the hero Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0024
rows.name: You just...enjoy pain or something?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0025
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0026
rows.name:
Because you wanted to
meet the hero Adel?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0027
rows.name: Because you like painful things?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0028
rows.name: How should I answer?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0029
rows.name: Ya wanted to meet the hero Adel, right?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0030
rows.name: Ya like painful things, don'tcha?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0101
rows.name: Yes, exactly...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0102
rows.name:
To be exact, it wasn't about
meeting him, but rather
learning more about him.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0201
rows.name: Wha-!?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0202
rows.name:
Don't misunderstand! I absolutely
do not enjoy that sort of thing!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0203
rows.name:
I won't deny that being here brings
me more pain than I expected...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0204
rows.name:
I'm simply enduring it as
part of my training, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0205
rows.name:
I definitely do NOT enjoy pain
or suffering of any kind!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0206
rows.name: Nngh!

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0207
rows.name: I-I see... But then, why come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0208
rows.name:
Y-Yeah, that's right... Then
why did you want to come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0209
rows.name:
I was clearly off the mark... But
why did you want to come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0210
rows.name:
I see, ya have normal
interests after all. So,
why did ya want to come here?

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0211
rows.name: Well...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0212
rows.name:
I wanted to learn even a
little about the hero Adel.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0301
rows.name:
Homura, Hikari, Kagutsuchi, as
well as Shin and Metsu... they're
all linked to the hero Adel.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0302
rows.name:
By learning about the past, I wanted
to understand the present...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0303
rows.name:
I thought that by knowing history,
the meaning of our current conflict
would become clearer.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0304
rows.name:
That way, my lance can strike
down our true enemies without
doubt or hesitation.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0305
rows.name:
Tokiha, you're too serious. I don't
think you need to go that far.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0306
rows.name:
You're overthinking this,
Tokiha. You don't need to
push yourself so hard...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0307
rows.name:
Tokiha, being too serious is
problematic too. You're not
being normal right now.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0308
rows.name:
Ain't Tokiha bein' too serious?
Ya don't have to go that far...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0309
rows.name: Not at all! This is the least I can do.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0310
rows.name:
It's my duty to serve as my
Driver's sword and shield.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0311
rows.name:
I need to have absolute
clarity in my purpose.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0312
rows.name:
Now, let's investigate
this cavern a bit more.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0313
rows.name: Ugh...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0314
rows.name:
...No, don't worry about
me. Let's move forward.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0315
rows.name:
I understand Tokiha's
strong will well, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0316
rows.name:
We should probably head
back for today though...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0317
rows.name:
I'm impressed by Tokiha's
determination...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0318
rows.name:
We need to leave soon or
Tokiha might collapse...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0319
rows.name:
I can truly appreciate
Tokiha's strong resolve...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0320
rows.name:
I need to intervene, or she'll push
herself past her breaking point.

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0321
rows.name:
I sure understand Tokiha's
strong will, but...

rows.label: kizunatalk066_msg0322
rows.name:
We should head back soon, or
Tokiha's gonna collapse.
